message: Newer and timed searches not limited to 20 results in Twitter and Google+

title: Added options to <application> tag to manifest to prevent Genymotion crash. Long…
message: Added options to <application> tag to manifest to prevent Genymotion crash. Long clicking list row shows popup menu.

title: Images in detail activities now clickable. Same method used to detect result…
message: Images in detail activities now clickable. Same method used to detect result type for list row and detail activity. Current entered hashtag now a static field in SitesActivity rather than member. Improved row layout of saved hashtags. Facebook post now linkified in detail view.

title: Removed setRetainInstance(true) as it was causing crash on opening reply dialog…
message: Removed setRetainInstance(true) as it was causing crash on opening reply dialog after rotation. Arraylists of result and types not serialized, but stored/restored from a static class on runtime changes.

title: Detail activities now use card background. Moved saved hashtag option to…
message: Detail activities now use card background. Moved saved hashtag option to overflow menu. Icons in IconPagerIndicator now centered rather than pushed to top of layout. Reshuffle assets.

title: Moved initialization of search and user handlers to onCreate() to avoid…
message: Moved initialization of search and user handlers to onCreate() to avoid recreation on orientation change.

title: SitesFragment now has setRetainInstance() set to true to avoid serializing…
message: SitesFragment now has setRetainInstance() set to true to avoid serializing results and resultTypes list. NewResultsBar remembers it's own visibility across runtime changes.

title: Added SitesDetailActivity as base class for all detail view activities. Clicking…
message: Added SitesDetailActivity as base class for all detail view activities. Clicking on hashtags on detail view now shows pop up to search for it within the app.

title: Made enum strings final. Renamed afterCurrentSearch() to afterInitialSearch().…
message: Made enum strings final. Renamed afterCurrentSearch() to afterInitialSearch(). Improved check for future time in getFuzzyDateTime().

title: NewResultsBar scroll button now scrolls to start of new results or to top…
message: NewResultsBar scroll button now scrolls to start of new results or to top depending on listview's current scroll position. Added text expand animation to indicate when it has scrolled to start of new results.

title: Removed unused v7 support library project
message: Removed unused v7 support library project

title: Improved Detail Views. Clear search history now shows confirmation dialog before…
message: Improved Detail Views. Clear search history now shows confirmation dialog before deleting. Added Trashcan icon to clear search history option.

title: Removed nineoldandroids. minSdkVersion will stay at 14 from now on.
message: Removed nineoldandroids. minSdkVersion will stay at 14 from now on.

title: Added nineoldandroids library for animation support on pre Honeycomb devices.
message: Added nineoldandroids library for animation support on pre Honeycomb devices.

title: Site specific drawables for login buttons. Fixed card padding.
message: Site specific drawables for login buttons. Fixed card padding.

title: Google+ static data class now returns null rather than throwing RTE when…
message: Google+ static data class now returns null rather than throwing RTE when push/pop mechanism fails. Introduced single function in SitesFragment for accessing entered hashtag rather than littering code with getActivity().getHashtag() calls. Squelched broadcast delivered by SitesService now causes loading view of NEWER as well as OLDER search to be reset too.

title: Cleaned debug statements littered around code. Old search results now cleared as…
message: Cleaned debug statements littered around code. Old search results now cleared as soon as new search begins

title: Moved all receiver/bus registration/unregistration to onStart/Stop from…
message: Moved all receiver/bus registration/unregistration to onStart/Stop from onResume/Pause. If service broadcasts search intent when listener is not registered, ready view is now shown rather than infinite progress bar.

title: Search while not logged in now animates the login button rather than showing a…
message: Search while not logged in now animates the login button rather than showing a toast. Login webviews now show progress while loading pages rather than blank pages. Split SharedPreferenceHelper into AccountPrefs and DefaultPrefs. Auto Update is now a simple toggle rather than a ListPreference.

title: Google+ search for newer results now shows truly newer results rather than…
message: Google+ search for newer results now shows truly newer results rather than including repeated ones. Optimised imports and formatting.

title: Active sites change now handled in onRestart rather than onStart method
message: Active sites change now handled in onRestart rather than onStart method

title: Fixed ListView position not remembered on screen rotation due to MySwipeRefreshLayout.
message: Fixed ListView position not remembered on screen rotation due to MySwipeRefreshLayout.

title: Changed values of auto update interval. Introduced custom SwipeRefreshLayout…
message: Changed values of auto update interval. Introduced custom SwipeRefreshLayout that saves it's refresh position on recreation.

title: Added option to select/disable auto update interval. Improved handling of active sites change.
message: Added option to select/disable auto update interval. Improved handling of active sites change.

title: Search results now auto updated every 20 seconds using handler's postDelayed method.
message: Search results now auto updated every 20 seconds using handler's postDelayed method.

title: Long clicking list row now opens the result in browser. Better…
message: Long clicking list row now opens the result in browser. Better TwitterDetailActivity. Changed resources.

title: Added light icons for better coontrast on dark NewResultsBar.
message: Added light icons for better coontrast on dark NewResultsBar.

title: NewResultsBar now persisted properly across activity lifecycle. Replaced enums…
message: NewResultsBar now persisted properly across activity lifecycle. Replaced enums with ints to represent views of SitesFragment. Refactored initViewReady into several smaller methods.

title: Added a bar to show new results count and to scroll to new results directly.…
message: Added a bar to show new results count and to scroll to new results directly. Changed the card background from XML layer list to 9patch.

title: Footer View simplified. Clicking logout shows confirmation dialog before logging…
message: Footer View simplified. Clicking logout shows confirmation dialog before logging out. Logging in gives option to search to hashtag directly if one is already entered.

title: Added FacebookDetailActivity. Facebook buttons have icons and redirect to FB…
message: Added FacebookDetailActivity. Facebook buttons have icons and redirect to FB post. All similar UI elements now have common styles. A newly added fragment can now directly search for the current hashtag if it's already entered.

title: Optimised Facebook Rows. Posts with no messages now not shown. Deleting saved…
message: Optimised Facebook Rows. Posts with no messages now not shown. Deleting saved hashtags now shows a toast with undo button (code pilfered from SuperToasts library). New package events for all Otto related events. Clicking on images of persons now opens their respective profiles. Keyboard shown by default on TwitterReplyDialog.

title: Login Handlers now derive from SitesLoginHandler to ensure proper…
message: Login Handlers now derive from SitesLoginHandler to ensure proper register/unregister in SitesActvity lifecycle. Images in ViewImageActivity can be saved to Gallery. Changes in active sites happen only when preferences are actually changed rather than on every onStart()

title: Added GPlus media row and GPlus Buttons. Twitter Action AsyncTasks now use Otto…
message: Added GPlus media row and GPlus Buttons. Twitter Action AsyncTasks now use Otto to communicate their results. Moved scrollIfHidden() from SitesButtons to SitesFragment. Lots of other changes.

title: FacebookHeader class to show common facebook row info. Twitter Replies and…
message: FacebookHeader class to show common facebook row info. Twitter Replies and Retweets now work. SavedHashtagActivity base class for all activities wanting the saved hashtags nav drawer. New resources for facebook actions. Acitvating/deactivating sites now does not reset already exising fragments.

title: Twitter header display now managed by separate view. Fixed SitesButtons…
message: Twitter header display now managed by separate view. Fixed SitesButtons architecture. Introduced button to go into details mode. Twitter images now displayed in a separated activity instead of redirecting to browser.

title: Google+ now displays text only list rows. General code fixes and optimisations.
message: Google+ now displays text only list rows. General code fixes and optimisations.

title: Added Google+ Sign in option. Reformatted code.
message: Added Google+ Sign in option. Reformatted code.

title: Added Google+ libraries and stub files. Changed the way active sites changes are handled
message: Added Google+ libraries and stub files. Changed the way active sites changes are handled

title: Reorganised Facebook rows to avoid random crashes due to NPEs. Row elements are clickable.
message: Reorganised Facebook rows to avoid random crashes due to NPEs. Row elements are clickable.

title: Added option in Settings screen to clear recently searched hashtags.
message: Added option in Settings screen to clear recently searched hashtags.

title: Removed useless warning in Settings screen.
message: Removed useless warning in Settings screen.

title: Sites can now be activated and deactivated from the new Settings screen. Added…
message: Sites can now be activated and deactivated from the new Settings screen. Added Logout option in menu. Major changes in ViewPager/PagerAdapter/IconPagerIndicator to enable activating/deactivating sites at runtime.

title: Added separate row types for separate types of results in Twitter. Expand now…
message: Added separate row types for separate types of results in Twitter. Expand now only show buttons while all main content is visible directly.

title: Began working on different row layouts for different types of statuses/posts.
message: Began working on different row layouts for different types of statuses/posts.

title: Clicking links in rows now opens in browser.
message: Clicking links in rows now opens in browser.

message: Switched to Dark Action Bar. Removed all unused drawables.

title: Moved to cards style UI for list rows.
message: Moved to cards style UI for list rows.

title: Switched from RelativeLayout to FrameLayout to avoid image resizing as list row…
message: Switched from RelativeLayout to FrameLayout to avoid image resizing as list row expands/collapses. Play button for FB videos. Expand handles now center horizontally.

title: Removed ViewExpander and added SitesExpandView to take care of expanding rows.…
message: Removed ViewExpander and added SitesExpandView to take care of expanding rows. ListView now smooth scrolls is row is hidden after expanding.

title: Replaced hardcoded strings in SitesListRows with string resources. Updated TODO.
message: Replaced hardcoded strings in SitesListRows with string resources. Updated TODO.

title: Added better style for siteslistrows.
message: Added better style for siteslistrows.

title: Smaller remove icon for saved hashtags. Expand text now indicated type of object…
message: Smaller remove icon for saved hashtags. Expand text now indicated type of object to expand (photo, video, link etc). IconPagerIndicator uses ImageButtons instead of ImageViews.

title: IconPagerIndicator now flaunts drop shadow and site color for selected page.…
message: IconPagerIndicator now flaunts drop shadow and site color for selected page. Changed file names. Added xml fade animator.

title: Removed redundant layouts in all compound views by using merge. New codestyle…
message: Removed redundant layouts in all compound views by using merge. New codestyle for XML to remove space at end of closing tags.

title: Added IconPagerIndicator from ViewPagerIndicator library (not being used yet).…
message: Added IconPagerIndicator from ViewPagerIndicator library (not being used yet). Fixed NPE when picture in FacebookDetailView is null

title: Added new icons for various actions. Removed ActionBar tabs entirely.
message: Added new icons for various actions. Removed ActionBar tabs entirely.

title: Added base foundation on which to show indicative action bar icons
message: Added base foundation on which to show indicative action bar icons

title: Added newer and better resources. Added Action bar nav drawer toggle. Saved…
message: Added newer and better resources. Added Action bar nav drawer toggle. Saved hashtags now can be deleted. Switched from SimpleCursorAdapter to custom CursorAdapter for saved hashtags list.

title: Rolled MyIntentService which cancels pending messages, but not the running one,…
message: Rolled MyIntentService which cancels pending messages, but not the running one, when a new one arrives. Saved hashtags now clickable. Added helpful comments.

title: Fixed crash when trying to save already saved hashtag
message: Fixed crash when trying to save already saved hashtag

title: Added content provider for saved hashtags.
message: Added content provider for saved hashtags.

title: Introduced crude hashtag save feature. Image cache reduce to one hour from three days.
message: Introduced crude hashtag save feature. Image cache reduce to one hour from three days.

title: Row expand animations now work as intended..Finally! :)
message: Row expand animations now work as intended..Finally! :)

title: Changed minSdk from 14 to 16. List rows show default animation changes. Fixed…
message: Changed minSdk from 14 to 16. List rows show default animation changes. Fixed modifiers in TwitterListRow

title: Added ToDo file, recent search suggestions.
message: Added ToDo file, recent search suggestions.

title: Reformatted code and optimised imports
message: Reformatted code and optimised imports

title: Reverted to old way of remembering expanded view via listview tag. Both fb and…
message: Reverted to old way of remembering expanded view via listview tag. Both fb and twitter views expand sans animation.

title: Trying out a new idea for abstracting expandable rows, animations for expand etc.
message: Trying out a new idea for abstracting expandable rows, animations for expand etc.

title: Expandable rows for Twitter and Facebook. Expandable views loaded only when the…
message: Expandable rows for Twitter and Facebook. Expandable views loaded only when the row is actually expanded.

title: Facebook list rows are expandable. Clicking on one shows the corresponding…
message: Facebook list rows are expandable. Clicking on one shows the corresponding attached media. No animation yet

title: Changed theme from Holo Dark to Holo Light. Facebook results show an attachment…
message: Changed theme from Holo Dark to Holo Light. Facebook results show an attachment view in case any picture/link or video attached to post. Search handler directly returns results list instead of bundling it up first

title: Facebook paging working.
message: Facebook paging working.

title: Removed Instagram fragment. Completed Search/User handler and Service for Facebook.
message: Removed Instagram fragment. Completed Search/User handler and Service for Facebook.

title: Added Facebook login.
message: Added Facebook login.

title: Moved handler listeners in constructors to ensure they are always set. Removed…
message: Moved handler listeners in constructors to ensure they are always set. Removed old debug stmts and added some new ones. Replaced word auth with login. General code improvement/refactorization.

title: Added facebook4j library. SharedPreferences now managed by a helper. Abstracted…
message: Added facebook4j library. SharedPreferences now managed by a helper. Abstracted most reusable code from TwitterFragment to SitesFragment.

title: Screen rotation now works on auth sceen.
message: Screen rotation now works on auth sceen.

title: Moved footer listener within sites footer. Screen rotation now works fine except during auth.
message: Moved footer listener within sites footer. Screen rotation now works fine except during auth.

title: Images now displayed in Twitter list. Added default twitter logo for missing…
message: Images now displayed in Twitter list. Added default twitter logo for missing images. A simple tweet dialog opens on clicking a tweet in list. Moved handler listener interfaces to within respective handlers. Auth now uses IntentService rather than finnicky AsyncTasks.

title: Removed otto event library. Added urlimageviewhelper library. Removed context from SitesAdapter.
message: Removed otto event library. Added urlimageviewhelper library. Removed context from SitesAdapter.

message: Added few more colors in palette

title: Replaced Exceptions with if blocks to control flow. Refactored TwitterFragment…
message: Replaced Exceptions with if blocks to control flow. Refactored TwitterFragment to implement interfaces itself rather than through member listeners. Fixed enum names. Used SwipeRefreshLayout for fetching newer results. Removed unused strings from strings.xml

title: Footer View abstracted in same way as SitesFragment. Reorganised class and package hierarchy.
message: Footer View abstracted in same way as SitesFragment. Reorganised class and package hierarchy.

title: Abandoned AsyncTasks in favor of IntentServices. No more listening to…
message: Abandoned AsyncTasks in favor of IntentServices. No more listening to connectivity changes as no continuous network connections needed. Split searches into current, older and newer with appropriate methods and enums for each type.

message: Added stubs for searching for older and newer results from twitter

message: Removed that which should not have been added in the first place.

title: Twitter sign in handled by separate activity. Introduced logout option for…
message: Twitter sign in handled by separate activity. Introduced logout option for twitter. Logically split files into packages. General code improvements.

message: Introduced SitesHandler interface for standardising networking code. New error view when app crashes/gets exceptions etc.

message: Holder pattern for ViewAnimator views. AsyncTask to search hashtags on Twitter.

message: Added twitter4j for using Twitter API. Used BroadcastReceiver to know about network changes. Added base fragment with ViewAnimator to which superclass fragments can provide their own childviews.

message: Uses Otto event bus to notify site fragments when user enter new hashtag
